sqlMap.select: SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT storeunq||'' storeunq, cateunq, storename, storeinfo, storeopentime, storeclosetime, storeclosedays, storephone, storeaddr, to_char(storerate,'fm9.0')||'' storerate, decode(fee,'0','무료',fee||'원') fee FROM store WHERE cateunq = '111' ORDER BY storerate DESC )a) b

select
storeunq||'' storeunq,
likechk from zzimlist where cateunq = '$cateunq$' and userid = '$userid$'
